items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the FA Cup tie kicking off at 2pm GMT ‚öΩ Live scores | Sign up for Football Daily | Email Daniel At Pride Park, Leeds have come from behind to lead Derby. They‚Äôre playing with so much confidence now they‚Äôre setting up in a 3-5-2. Bad news for Liverpool: Continue reading...

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Fletcher 'prepared' to lead Man Utd until summer
items.summary: Darren Fletcher has said he's "prepared" if Manchester United decide to hand him the head coach job until the end of the season.

items.title: Liverpool's Conor Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: Salah scores to set up AFCON reunion with Man√©
items.summary: Mohamed Salah scored his fourth goal of the Africa Cup of Nations as Egypt defeated defending champions Ivory Coast 3-2 in Agadir.

items.title: Buoyant Rosenior lauds 5-star Chelsea start
items.summary: New Chelsea head coach Liam Rosenior promised more to come from his second string after they swept aside Charlton 5-1 at the Valley in his first match in charge.

items.title: Van Persie kritisch op Feyenoord na gelijkspel: 'Zo vrij schieten mag niet'
items.summary: Robin van Persie baalde van de late gelijkmaker van SC Heerenveen. Amourricho van Axel Dongen werd helemaal vrijgelaten en kon een hoekschop raak schieten. Van Persie legde uit hoe de organisatie van Feyenoord is bij corners en benadrukte dat zijn ploeg het daar niet goed deed.

items.title: Manchester City v Everton, Chelsea v West Ham and more: WSL clockwatch ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Women‚Äôs Super League updates as the goals go in ‚öΩ Live scores | Get in touch! Email Emillia here Meanwhile, London City Lionesses cut ties with Jocelyn Pr√™cheur despite being sixth in the table. Pr√™cheur had been in charge of the club since the summer of 2024 and led them to the Championship title last term. Eder Maestre took over as the club‚Äôs new head coach on New Year‚Äôs Day. Upon his arrival, he said: ‚ÄúI am delighted to join London City Lionesses. I love English football and representing this club is a real honour. In my opinion this project is now the best project in women‚Äôs football. The ambitions are very aligned with my values and I‚Äôm very excited.‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Arsenal snel weer op 1-1, wondergoal Peterson in Deventer
items.summary: Welkom in de VI Live op deze ijskoude zondag 11 januari. Volg hier de ontwikkelingen binnen en buiten de grenzen, met op deze plek onder meer aandacht voor de Eredivisie, de finale van de Super Cup tussen Barcelona en Real Madrid en het FA Cup-toernooi.

items.title: Gnonto and Tanaka turn tie on its head as Leeds knock Derby out of FA Cup
items.summary: Daniel Farke had no need to channel Marcel Bielsa and send any spies to watch Derby train this past week to know that, even with eight changes to his starting XI, his Leeds squad had more than enough Premier League class to overcome mid-table Championship opposition. Goals from the fringe players Wilfried Gnonto, Ao Tanaka and James Justin enabled Leeds to bounce back from their dramatic 4-3 defeat at Newcastle and overturn Ben Brereton D√≠az‚Äôs first-half goal. Leeds have lost just once in nine games now and, as well as an eight-point buffer from the relegation zone, can now countenance the prospect of an FA Cup run. With all the history surrounding this midday kick-off, it was a tame opening half-hour before Leeds upped the intensity to earn the chance to go ahead. Even with their much-changed lineup, the running off the ball and incision of passing of the Premier League side suggested an opening goal was incoming. The fact it then went to Derby only accelerated the adrenaline. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Ajax controleert duel met Telstar, vuurwerk buiten stadion
items.summary: Welkom in deze VI Live met aandacht voor Telstar - Ajax. Om 14.30 uur is de aftrap van dit Eredivisie-duel. Op deze plek houden we je op de hoogte.

items.title: Hoe Steijn kijkt naar afgenomen aanvoerdersband bij Feyenoord
items.summary: Sem Steijn heeft gereageerd op het verliezen van de aanvoerdersband bij Feyenoord. Timon Wellenreuther heeft die rol overgenomen van de middenvelder. Steijn heeft er vrede mee.

items.title: Rangers sign Chukwuani as midfielder becomes R√∂hl‚Äôs first arrival
items.summary: Rangers have signed Tochi Chukwuani from Austrian side Sturm Graz as the midfielder becomes Danny R√∂hl‚Äôs first signing.

items.title: GB's McColgan regains European 10km record - a week after losing it
items.summary: Great Britain's Eilish McColgan has regained the European Women's 10km record - a week after it was snatched from her by Belgium's Jana Van Lent.

items.title: Second-half turnaround sees Leeds overcome Derby
items.summary: Two goals in four second-half minutes helped a much-changed Leeds United come from behind to beat Derby County 3-1 at Pride Park to book their place in the FA Cup fourth round.

items.title: Van Persie zet kampioenschap uit het hoofd: 'Focus op onszelf'
items.summary: Robin van Persie was na afloop van de remise tegen SC Heerenveen ( 2-2 ) niet te spreken over het spel dat zijn ploeg in de tweede helft op de mat legde. Het verschil met koploper PSV bedraagt inmiddels dertien punten, maar Van Persie wil voorlopig vooral naar zijn eigen team kijken.

items.title: 'I legged it' - Macclesfield chairman joined pitch invasion
items.summary: Macclesfield chairman Rob Smethurst says he feels like his side "won the FA Cup" with Saturday's third-round win over holders Crystal Palace.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is ruled out for the rest of the domestic season after suffering a significant knee injury, involving damage to bone and ligament.

items.title: Poland win United Cup as Bencic misses out on perfect tournament
items.summary: Poland secured a maiden United Cup title at last after snapping Switzerland star Belinda Bencic's nine-match winning streak at the mixed-gender team tournament in Australia.

items.title: Arne Slot hit with Conor Bradley injury blow as he vows to go strong against Barnsley
items.summary: Bradley to miss rest of season with serious knee injury Slot will not repeat past error in FA Cup third-round tie Arne Slot has promised not to repeat last season‚Äôs FA Cup gamble against Plymouth when Liverpool entertain Barnsley in the third round on Monday. One player he will not be able to select, however, is Conor Bradley after it was confirmed the right-back will have to undergo surgery on the knee injury he sustained in Thursday‚Äôs goalless draw with Arsenal and is likely to rule him out for the rest of the season. Slot changed all 10 outfield players for the fourth-round tie at Home Park and was punished as Plymouth, then bottom of the Championship, produced a huge shock to win 1-0. He compounded his selection risk with an inexperienced bench that included only two senior players; Curtis Jones and Darwin N√∫√±ez. Slot stands by his decision on the basis Liverpool were challenging for four trophies at the time. But with his team out of the Carabao Cup and a distant fourth in the Premier League this season, that pressure no longer applies. Continue reading...
